author: potuz
content: That's impossible to measure in less than several years. With 4-5 proposals expected per year, it will be natural to see some validators with 10 and many with 1. In addition some will be in quiet periods and others in turbulent markets. Variation of earnings from proposals will be huge so you can't rely on any averaging mechanism to charge operators
